snippet: Liu Cixin’s “The Three-Body Problem,” a science-fiction trilogy whose first book comes out Tuesday in the United States, has attracted a diverse Chinese audience.
abstract: English translation of Liu Cixin novel The Three-Body Problem, first of a science-fiction trilogy, is set for release in the United States; Liu has emerged as the best-selling Chinese science-fiction author in China, and his series has breathed new life into the genre in country.
lead_paragraph: Liu Cixin’s “The Three-Body Problem,” a science-fiction trilogy whose first book comes out Tuesday in the United States, has attracted a diverse Chinese audience.

headline.seo: Liu Cixin’s ‘The Three-Body Problem’ Is Published in U.S.
headline.main: In a Topsy-Turvy World, China Warms to Sci-Fi
